pullrequest.title: Add gpu rays class for lidar simulation

content.raw:
ok I have tidied up the code - it's still in the same branch, `gpu_rays_ian2`. Can you take it from here? We probably also want to port more gpu\_laser integration tests from gazebo.

I have not addressed the 3 points I mentioned in the previous point, I’ll leave that to you. 

* Public API, I think the APIs you had in the integration test gives a good idea of what users may expect from the GpuRays class. We could hide many of the others inside OgreGpuRays.
* The code check script should help catch some of these issues
* Optional. Don’t have strong opinion on this.
